name: Krithika Rangarajan

message: Hello everyone, I am Udit Mehrotra, Class of 1998. Don't remember what I did at Exun exactly , but it was a lot of fun ðŸ™‚ glad to be here! based in new delhi

name: Mrinal Sinha
message: Hello Exun alums ðŸ˜Š. This is Mrinal Sinha, Class of 1997. How are you @Udit Mehrotra ?

name: Mohit Taneja
message: Hello hello, Mohit Taneja 2007, I am in Austin, Texas. I work as a Product Manager at Arm, and help define our data center and 5G/6G IP roadmaps.

name: Ananay Arora
message: Hi everyone! I'm Ananay - President, Class of 2016-17. I'm currently working at Legix as a founding engineer based in Phoenix, AZ. Fun fact - I love to DJ as a hobby. Looking forward to meeting you all!

name: Bharat Kashyap
message: Thanks Ankit for taking the lead on this! I'm Bharat, President in 2015. Engineer in open-source dev tools currently, worked in tech for consulting before this. Very excited to have the alumni group going :)

name: Jawahar
message: Exun 2000 Vice President along with Ankit. These days, I work on incubating newer business within larger companies, currently in media and streaming, previously Samsung. Maryland/Stern alum (and IIT dropout?) Residing in the NYC area. Always happy to connect

name: Prannay Khosla
message: Exun 2014-15, currently an Entrepreneur as well, based out of SF. Worked in self driving and HFT before this. IIT 2019.

name: Gursartaj Singh Nijjar
message: Exun 2007, President alongside Working at barclays in the M&A team in Mumbai. Studied at stephens/iim bangalore Been mostly in finance since 2010! Great to finally having our own alumni network!

name: Aryaman Chandra
message: Hi! I am Aryaman Chandra. Exun 2022 - I am currently a student and a freelance developer and designer

name: Ankit Wadhwa
message: Exun 2000, President - now an entrepreneur, having built and exited two sizable tech companies. Currently working on my third venture in crypto. I spent 7 years in consulting before transitioning to entrepreneurship. I'm an IIT/Wharton alum and a proud father of a 5-year-old. Always happy to connectâ€”feel free to reach out!
